title: Brittany 18th Century Château Escape Near Saint Malo with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the grandeur of 18th-century France with an opulent château stay in this meticulously restored castle near the coastline of Brittany. Located in Saint Malo and surrounded by lush landscapes, this revered chateau beckons you to partake in a lavish retreat reminiscent of aristocratic indulgence. Inside, period chinoiserie design and soft colours reflect the chic, rustic charm of the estate's past.

Everything you want from a glamorous rendezvous can be found at this boutique estate. Start your day with a sumptuous breakfast in the grand dining hall, then explore the sprawling estate, taking in the manicured garden and tranquil ponds. 

Go beyond the estate gardens to uncover charming towns lined with cafes, museums and historic monuments. The walled city of Saint Malo is a short drive from the property and the sea breeze of Brittany's beaches is also within close reach.
